com.ibm.collaboration.realtime.gateway.plugin
Interface PluginImHandler

All Superinterfaces:
PluginRegistration
public interface PluginImHandler
extends PluginRegistration

This interface may be implemented by Message Handler plug-ins to receive notifications on instant messages passing through the gateway.

Since:
7.5

Method Summary
 void instantMessage(ImEvent imEvent)
          This method is called when an instant message is being sent from a user in the originating community to a user in the destination community.
 void onInstantMessage(SessionEventStatus imEvent)
          This method is called when an instant message was processed by the destination community.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.collaboration.realtime.gateway.plugin.PluginRegistration
customPropertiesChanged, init, terminate
 

Method Detail

instantMessage

void instantMessage(ImEvent imEvent)
This method is called when an instant message is being sent from a user in the originating community to a user in the destination community.

Parameters:
imEvent - - the message event

onInstantMessage

void onInstantMessage(SessionEventStatus imEvent)
This method is called when an instant message was processed by the destination community.

Parameters:
imEvent - - the message event
